name: Ankle Hops
description: Hops from toes; calf raise then hop

name: Arm Circles
description: Forward or backwards; large or small circles

name: Bird Dogs
description: With hands and knees on floor, hold one leg up and straight with alterating arm out

name: Butt Kicks
description: Run in place, kick butt

name: Curtsy Lunge
description: While lunging bring one foot behind the other, until back thigh is almost parallel to floor

name: Fire Hydrants
description: On hands and knees, raise one leg to the side 90 degrees

name: Full Sit Ups
description: Lying on back, sit up and touch toes

name: Hand Release Push Ups
description: From Push up completely lower to floor release hands off ground, return to push up position

name: Heel Touches
description: In sit up position, alternate side to side touching heels

name: High Knees Run
description: Run in place bringing knees up 90 degrees

name: Hollow Body Rock
description: On back, lift feet and arms and head off the floor, hold and rock back and forth

name: Hop In Place
description: Two feet hop in place

name: Hurdles
description: Standing, feet together, bring knee up and over an imaginary hurdle, tap floor, then return

name: Inch Worm
description: From standing position touch toes, then inch forward on fingertips until a plank, then return

name: Jumping Split Squat
description: In lunge position, jump up, then return

name: Jump Rope
description: Jump in place with an invisible jump rope

name: Long Jump With Jog Back
description: From standing, jump forward, then tiny steps jog back

name: Outside Leg Mountain Climbers
description: Mountain climbers, but leg is outside of arm

name: Plank Jacks
description: Bring legs in and out while in a plank

name: Push-Ups: Diamond
description: Push ups with hands touching

name: Push-Ups: Widestance
description: Push ups with wide arm stance

name: Raised Leg Plank
description: In plank position, hold one leg up

name: Seal Claps
description: Like jumping jacks; but as legs jump out; hands clap together in front with straight arms

name: Shoulder Taps
description: In plank position release one hand and tap alternate shoulder, then repeat on other side

name: Shuffle Splits
description: One leg forward one back, then switch quickly on repeat to shuffle

name: Shuttles
description: Shuttle side to side with quick steps

name: Side Hops
description: Jump side to side over imaginary line

name: Single Foot Hop In Place
description: One foot hop in place

name: Slalom Jumps
description: Alternating single leg side jump

name: Sumo Squat
description: Wide leg squat, hands touch ground

name: Swimmer
description: On stomach, alternate hands and legs tapping ground

name: T Push Ups
description: Do a push up then rotate to a one arm side plank, hold, then return to push up and repeat

name: Vertical Jumps
description: Jump as high as possible, arms up

name: V Ups
description: Lying on back, bring straight legs and straight arms to touch
